title: mEgha garjanai pola
sahitya:
mEgha garjanaiyaip-pOla mana dAham tIra varuvAi hari rAmakrSNa


anupallavi

  shOkaminri inda mOha vanAntarattil Eka bhaktiyuDan vEgamAik-kUvinEn


caraNam    pUraNamAnauDan kAruNya mazhaiyinri bhOgam sezhuttiDumO
vivEkam tazhaittiDumO tava yOgam pazhuttiDumO en Uham palittiDumO
nAraNanE jagat kAraNanE jIva nAyakanE sukha dAyakanE sharaN
